record.field: ('Vendor_Bill' if obj.number else 'Draft_Vendor_Bill') + ('_' + obj.partner_id.display_name if obj.partner_id.display_name else '') + ('_' + obj.number if obj.number else '') + ('_' + datetime.strftime(obj.date_invoice, "%d-%m-%Y") if obj.date_invoice else '')
